title: Kafka Implementation for Microservices
description: Integrate Apache Kafka into the microservices architecture to enable event-driven communication between services, replacing/augmenting the current synchronous Feign client pattern with asynchronous messaging.

architecture.approach: Hybrid model - Kafka for async event-driven communication, keep Feign as optional fallback

userStories.title: Add Kafka to docker-compose.yml
userStories.description: Add Kafka service (KRaft mode) and Kafka UI to docker-compose.yml with confluentinc/cp-kafka:7.6.0 image, kafka-ui service, kafka-data volume, and update service dependencies

userStories.title: Update parent pom.xml with Kafka dependencies
userStories.description: Add spring-kafka to dependencyManagement section in parent pom.xml

userStories.title: Create ResourceNotFoundException
userStories.description: Create exception for 404 - Resource not found. Extends BaseException with constructor taking resourceName, fieldName, and fieldValue. Message format: '{resourceName} not found with {fieldName}: {fieldValue}'

userStories.title: Create DuplicateResourceException
userStories.description: Create exception for 409 - Resource already exists. Extends BaseException with constructor taking resourceName, fieldName, and fieldValue. Message format: '{resourceName} already exists with {fieldName}: {fieldValue}'

userStories.title: Create InsufficientStockException
userStories.description: Create exception for 409 - Stock shortage. Extends BaseException with constructor taking List<String> skuCodes. Message format: 'Insufficient stock for products: {skuCodes}'

userStories.title: Create ErrorResponse record
userStories.description: Create Java record for standard error response with fields: timestamp (Instant), status (int), error (String), message (String), path (String)

userStories.title: Add exceptions-common module to parent pom.xml
userStories.description: Add exceptions-common to the modules list in the parent pom.xml

userStories.title: Add exceptions-common dependency to product-service
userStories.description: Add exceptions-common dependency to product-service pom.xml

userStories.title: Create GlobalExceptionHandler for product-service
userStories.description: Create @RestControllerAdvice class handling: ResourceNotFoundException (404), MethodArgumentNotValidException (400), Exception (500). Return ErrorResponse with proper status codes and messages.

userStories.title: Refactor ProductService to use custom exceptions
userStories.description: Replace IllegalArgumentException('Product not found with id: ' + id) with ResourceNotFoundException('Product', 'id', id)

userStories.title: Add exceptions-common dependency to inventory-service
userStories.description: Add exceptions-common dependency to inventory-service pom.xml

userStories.title: Create GlobalExceptionHandler for inventory-service
userStories.description: Create @RestControllerAdvice class handling: ResourceNotFoundException (404), DuplicateResourceException (409), MethodArgumentNotValidException (400), Exception (500). Return ErrorResponse with proper status codes and messages.

userStories.title: Refactor InventoryService to use custom exceptions
userStories.description: Replace IllegalArgumentException('Inventory not found with skuCode: ' + skuCode) with ResourceNotFoundException('Inventory', 'skuCode', skuCode). Replace IllegalArgumentException('Inventory already exists with skuCode: ' + ...) with DuplicateResourceException('Inventory', 'skuCode', skuCode)

userStories.title: Add exceptions-common dependency to order-service
userStories.description: Add exceptions-common dependency to order-service pom.xml

userStories.title: Create GlobalExceptionHandler for order-service
userStories.description: Create @RestControllerAdvice class handling: ResourceNotFoundException (404), InsufficientStockException (409), FeignException (propagate status), MethodArgumentNotValidException (400), Exception (500). Return ErrorResponse with proper status codes and messages.

userStories.title: Refactor OrderService to use custom exceptions
userStories.description: Replace IllegalArgumentException('Product is not in stock, please try again later') with InsufficientStockException(skuCodes). Replace IllegalArgumentException('Order not found with orderNumber: ' + orderNumber) with ResourceNotFoundException('Order', 'orderNumber', orderNumber)

userStories.title: Create InventoryEventProducer
userStories.description: Create @Component with KafkaTemplate. Implement publishInventoryReserved and publishInventoryFailed methods

userStories.title: Create OrderEventConsumer
userStories.description: Create @Component with @KafkaListener for orders.placed topic. Call inventoryService.reserveInventory and publish appropriate response event

userStories.title: Update InventoryService with reservation logic
userStories.description: Inject InventoryReservationRepository and InventoryEventProducer. Add reserveInventory, releaseReservation, and confirmReservation methods

userStories.title: Update inventory-service application.properties
userStories.description: Add spring.kafka.bootstrap-servers, producer/consumer serializer configs, consumer group-id, trusted packages, topic names. localhost:9092 for default, kafka:29092 for docker

userStories.title: Add Kafka dependencies to product-service
userStories.description: Add spring-kafka and events-common dependencies (producer only, no consumer needed)

userStories.title: Create Kafka configuration for product-service
userStories.description: Create @Configuration class with ProducerFactory and KafkaTemplate beans. Add NewTopic bean for products.events

userStories.title: Create ProductEventProducer
userStories.description: Create @Component with KafkaTemplate. Implement publishProductCreated, publishProductUpdated, publishProductDeleted methods

userStories.title: Update ProductService with event publishing
userStories.description: Inject ProductEventProducer. Call publishProductCreated after createProduct, publishProductUpdated after updateProduct, publishProductDeleted before deleteProduct

userStories.title: Update product-service application.properties
userStories.description: Add spring.kafka.bootstrap-servers and producer serializer configs. localhost:9092 for default, kafka:29092 for docker

userStories.title: Create integration tests for Kafka
userStories.description: Add @SpringBootTest classes with @EmbeddedKafka for order-service and inventory-service. Test full async flow: order placed -> inventory reserved -> order confirmed

userStories.title: End-to-end verification
userStories.description: Verify complete async order flow with Docker: start Kafka, create product, add inventory, place order (verify PENDING), check order updates to CONFIRMED, test failure with insufficient inventory
